code: import React from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{PageLayout}from"../Components/PageLayout";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{TaskCard}from"../Components/TaskCard";import IdeaCard from"../Components/IdeaCard";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Search=function Search(){var _useParams=useParams(),searchTerm=_useParams.searchTerm;var _useSelector=useSelector(function(state){return state.tasks;}),tasks=_useSelector.tasks;var _useSelector2=useSelector(function(state){return state.ideas;}),ideas=_useSelector2.ideas;var tasksToShow=Object.values(tasks).filter(function(task){return task.taskData.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase());});var ideasToShow=Object.values(ideas).filter(function(idea){return idea.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase());});console.log(tasksToShow);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(PageLayout,{title:"Search Results",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-full p-4 bg-slate-100 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-xl",children:"Tasks"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"my-3"}),tasksToShow.length===0?"You don't have any task for "+searchTerm+".":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:tasksToShow.map(function(task){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskCard,{task:task});})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-full mt-5 p-4 bg-slate-100 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-xl",children:"Ideas"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"my-3"}),ideasToShow.length===0?"You don't have any idea for "+searchTerm+".":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:ideasToShow.map(function(idea){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IdeaCard,{small:true,idea:idea});})})]})]});};export default Search;
